Translations.Text: This because ili opposed DI His messenger! those oppose DI His messenger DI est strict en enforcing retribution
Vi chop arb las gxi star its trunk est en accordance kun di testament Li surely humiliate des wicked
Whatever DI restored por His messenger ne est rezult your milit efforts vi batal cxeval aux sur pied. DI est 1 who SEND His messengers whomever LI VOL! DI est Omnipotent

(Whatever DI restored al His messenger el defeated communities ir DI His messenger form charity). Vi don gxi relativ orf poor vojagx alien Tiel gxi ne ceter monopolized per fort among vi! Vi keep spoils don al vi messenger ne sorb ki li enjoins vi el pren! Vi reverence DI. DI est strict en enforcing retribution
(Vi don) needy immigrated Ili evicted their hejm deprived de their properties ili streb di grace plezur kaj ili supported DI His messenger! Ili est des truthful

As por those proviz them hejm rifugx est believers them ili am those immigrated them ne trov hesitation their kor help them! En fakt, ili readily don them priority ecx when ili bezon ki ili don for Ja those overcome their natural stinginess est successful unu
